code: import{PencilAltIcon,XCircleIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import movieService from"../../services/MovieService";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MoviesRow=_ref=>{let{movie,onDelete}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleDelete=async()=>{await movieService.delete(movie.id);onDelete(movie.id);};const handleUpdate=()=>{navigate("/admin/update-movie/".concat(movie.id),{state:{movie}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-b text-sm text-gray-800 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3",children:movie.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3",children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3",children:movie.genre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3",children:movie.duration}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 flex justify-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpdate,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PencilAltIcon,{className:"w-5 h-5  hover:text-blue-800"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XCircleIcon,{className:"w-5 h-5  hover:text-red-800"})})]})]});};export default MoviesRow;
